const accountId = context.accountId; return ( <>

{`Hello, ${accountId}!👋`}

Welcome to all things HERE Wallet!



The only wallet to use on $NEAR.



HERE Wallet Links

🔗---HERE Wallet Website

🔗---HERE Wallet Discord

🔗---HERE Wallet Telegram

🔗---HERE Wallet Download

🔗---HERE NFT Collection on Tradeport - Holders get an extra 1% APY staking!



What is HERE Wallet?

NEAR is a fast-growing ecosystem with over 20 million users. The main wallet for NEAR is the NEAR Wallet, but it is only available in web mode. Until a certain time, there was no convenient mobile wallet for NEAR. HERE Wallet focuses on the use of NEAR instead of storing it. You can stake, buy NEAR for BTC and other crypto and fiat, swap and more just in one app!

Benefits of HERE NFT🤝

Governance

Access to development and airdrops. Opportunity to participate in HERE DAO in the future. The more NFTs you get, the more governance power you will have.

NFT flex

A special role in HERE discord. Access to developer chat. NFT Avatar which will be displayed to other users.

Early access

Access to Beta versions with new features. Get rewards for feedback

Weekly Score🏆

Every week, you can earn score for specific actions, and the leaders in weekly leaderboard will get rewards in USDT.

Weekly Score #6 is ongoing!



How to earn score?

+1 Score for each 0.02 NEAR earned from Staking (max 200 score per week) 🚀

Invite friends: +50 score, +150 if friend connects binance 🚀

Add friends and give likes: +1 score for each friend's like 👍

Open the app every day: +5 score 📅

Daily swap of $10: +25 score (once a day) 💰, Daily swap of $100: +50 score (once a day) 💰

+1 score for each $20 turnover on swaps. (max 200 score per week) 💰

Find bugs in the APP and report them 🐛

NFT Holders get 25% increase on all score actions, Mutated Holders get 50%! 😲

);
